Tap the search icon to start searching \nTap the three dot icon for more actions
Access the browser sidebar by swiping from the edge of the screen
This is the browser. You can disable or rearrange this page from within \"Manage Screens\"
You can long press on an item to get more options such as adding to home or favorites
This is the app drawer. You can disable or rearrange this page from within \"Manage Screens\"
Tap three-lined button or swipe from the edge of the screen to access your favorited apps
All your favorited apps will show here. An app can be added to favorites from the app drawer
The home screen layout is different based off the orientation. You can place separate apps based off orientation
This is your home screen. Here you can place apps, widgets and more. You can swipe vertically to switch between home screens and horizontally for other pages
